verbose_text: XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR Briefly, patient plasma samples were heat inactivated (1 hour, 56degreesC) to inhibit residual ADAMTS13 activity, and next incubated with NHP (containing active ADAMTS13, 50 V%) for 2 hours at room temperature.
evidence: heat inactivated (1 hour, 56degreesC) to inhibit residual ADAMTS13
